pages.text: Studying the $(item)sapphire$() gem was rather strange. I can't determine whether this material is a solid or a liquid. It maintains it form, but it texture is liquid, almost as if something is holding the liquid together. I felt a sense of longing within this material, like it wanted to leave it solid state and explore the world freely.

Being aquatic in nature, the gem provides $(thing)water breathing$() and other assorted $(thing)water-based abilities$(). The utility applications for this particular gem seems plentiful. The tools crafted allow you to $(thing)explore land much easier$(), like you're flowing across the terrain. I feel free when using sapphire. It makes me want to explore this world and see what else it has to offer.
